TopicTitle: Rotating a ship while trying to dock effects both ...?

Articles.Content:
So I just did a 2 in 1 Mission to Ike/Duna.

Everything went great and I'm 50 feet from the return segment with the lander. But now when ever I rotate the ship to point at the other and both rotate. It's driving me insane........ Is there a fix for this

Edited December 19, 2014 by cheeseit
.25 or .90? it was a known bug in .25

0.90.

I restarted the game and it still keep doing it.

This is ....ing retarded. One movement by either ship causes both to enter a spin that just keeps ....ing speeding up faster and faster.

Edited December 19, 2014 by cheeseit

No need to swear. This is a known bug (also listed in the known issues stickies of this forum and here, or in my signature).

To save you the further frustration, simply switch to each of your ships (using ] or [) and press MOD+X while in control of each (ALT+X for windows).

Cheers,

~Claw
